sentences.en: A quavering voice, a whimsical mind.
sentences.cn: 嗓子颤抖, 心思诡戾.
贝伦森是个异想天开,不受拘束的人.

sentences.en: He greeted me with one of his whimsical smiles.
sentences.cn: 他用一种想入非非的笑来欢迎我.

sentences.en: He has a whimsical sense of humor.
He has a wonderful whimsical sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 他怪异的幽默感令人惊叹。

sentences.en: He recollected Cronshaw's whimsical metaphor of the Persian carpet.
sentences.cn: 他回忆克朗肖经常谈起的那个波斯地毯的寓言.

sentences.en: His graphic art became slighter and more whimsical.
sentences.cn: 他的平面艺术变得越来越无足轻重，越来越异想天开。

sentences.en: It may vary in mood from the whimsical even playfull, to the tragic and passionate.
sentences.cn: 它可以表现不同的情绪,从怪诞的,幽默滑稽的到悲怆的和热情的.

sentences.en: It may vary in mood from the whimsical, even playful, to the tragic and passionate.
sentences.cn: 它可以表现不同的情绪,从怪诞的 、 幽默滑稽的到悲怆的和热情的.
爱离奇而多变,高兴来就来,要走也不会事先通知.

sentences.en: Perhaps the lastest implication is " unusual " or " whimsical ".
sentences.cn: 也许,它的最新含义是 “ 不同于一般的 ” 或 “ 异想天开的 ”.

sentences.en: Sometimes my goal has been whimsical in the extreme.
sentences.cn: 有时候,我的目标千奇百怪.

sentences.en: Terry and I were more on the whimsical side.
This a whimsical and fabulous book a children's story as well as a thought - provoking adult fable.
sentences.cn: 这本书表面上看来是童话故事,但世故的成人读来也会觉得寓意 深远.

sentences.en: to have a whimsical sense of humour
You may call my facies whimsical.
sentences.cn: 你可以把我这些想法称为异想天开.

words.tran_cn: 异想天开地；古怪地；反复无常的
异想天开；反复无常；怪诞的行为或想法
古怪的；异想天开的；反复无常的

trans.tran_cn: 异想天开的，反复无常的，古怪的，奇形怪状的
trans.tran_en: unusual or strange and often amusing
